name: META - tactical battle arena
description:
Hi! 

My name is Petar Ivanček and I would like to share a gamplay concept I've been working on.

It is aimed at players that enjoy PvP tactics and strategy, but find MOBA and RTS games too twitchy or time consuming.

GAMEPLAY:

  • Destroy the enemy base
  • Buy heroes to protect your base
  • Control the center to collect more gold
  • Use gold to upgrade your heroes
  • With each upgrade a Hero gets a new ability, as well as more HP and damage

CHALLENGE:
Try to defeat the AI in less than 5 minutes.

TIPS:

  • Upgraded Heroes take longer to respawn and yield more gold when killed
  • Upgrade the Cannon - it automatically shoots at the enemy base
  • Use enemy UI Targeter - the little UI element above your Hero panels
  • The game is stable, but there might be occasional glitches in Hero behaviour
  • Use "NUMPAD *" and "NUMPAD /" to change game speed (if you find it too fast or too slow)
